posts.post_content:
1914 Coupon Type 2 Ty Cobb Portrait  PSA 2   
currently available via Birmingham Auctioneers (Aquarian Sports Cards/Scott Russell)'s live/internet pre war auction that closes Sunday, October 27. 
thanks for checking it out!
[url]https://birminghamauctioneersbid.com/Lots/Gallery[/url]

if you're searching for a very presentable red cobb (also, much scarcer than t206) I doubt you'll find a better deal.

wrinkle/crease is far less noticeable to the naked eye.

satisfaction guaranteed!

posts.post_title: T213 Coupon Ty Cobb Red PSA 2
